Noroi E: The Origin of Nightmares

name: Noroi E: The Origin of Nightmares
storyline:
Immerse yourself in the dark and terrifying world of "Noroi E: The Origin", a horror videogame that will transport you to the year 1823.

On this date, an event known as the Ascensions of Darkness occurs, where the greatest leaders of darkness ascend to Earth to appoint their faithful followers in this world.

You will enter the story of Mercedes Rodriguez, David's grandmother, who assumes the position of first minister in the order of followers of Lucifuge Rofocale under the command of Mammon, the Son of the Devil.

The plot goes back to the year 1723, when Urbain Grandier, a priest with a direct pact with Lucifer, commanded the being of darkness called Asmodeo.

The player assumes the role of David, the only son of Gabriela, daughter of Mercedes.

David and his family's life is apparently going normally in Japan, until strange and terrifying events begin to occur.

His mother, Gabriela, drastically changes her literary style, writing apocalyptic stories that later become real.

His father, Juan, stops painting landscapes and creates creepy paintings that hide dark secrets.

David begins to have nightmares and disturbing visions, feeling that something sinister is stalking him.

Determined to escape this situation, David travels to New Mexico-Albuquerque, where he meets a girl named Susan, who becomes his moral support.

Together, they decide to start a new life and expand David's business. However, terrifying events haunt him and a call from his grandmother forces him to return to Japan.

Upon returning, David is confronted with the news of his grandmother's strange death and discovers that someone has been impersonating her in her absence.

As he investigates, he finds a book written by his mother in 1950, which describes in detail her life abroad and a redemption.

David is plunged into a mystery involving his family and an ancestral curse.

The game takes place in different locations, from the quiet family life in Japan to the desert of Mexico, where David must confront dark forces and discover how to stop the curse that threatens his offspring and his own existence.

Players will experience an atmosphere of terror, solve puzzles, interact with sinister characters and uncover dark secrets as they delve into David's troubled mind.

Will you dare to face the Nightmares that torment David and discover the truth behind the ancient curse that haunts him?

Get ready to dive into this terrifying world full of suspense, chilling revelations, and a constant struggle against supernatural forces.
summary: You will have to make important decisions that will affect the outcome of the game and the fate of the main character. Will you be able to find a way to stop the curse and save yourself from the darkness, or will you fall victim to the darkness and join the ranks of the dead?
